data.lyric:
[ti:8]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]8 - Billie Eilish
[00:00.41]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:00.83]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:01.25]Wait a minute let me finish
[00:06.96]I know you don't care
[00:10.78]But can you listen
[00:16.52]I came commited guess I overdid it
[00:22.51]Wore my heart out on a chain
[00:26.07]Around my neck but now it's missing hmm
[00:33.39]Da da da da da da
[00:37.22]Da da da da da da da
[00:42.09]Oh hmm
[00:45.43]So I think I better go
[00:50.98]I never really know how to please you
[00:56.33]You're looking at me like I'm see through
[01:02.53]I guess I'm gonna go
[01:06.59]I just never know how you feel
[01:11.91]Do you even feel anything
[01:19.53]Da da da da da da
[01:23.34]Da da da da da da da
[01:28.40]Oh hmm
[01:32.87]You said don't treat me badly
[01:36.86]But you said it so sadly
[01:39.60]So I did the best I could
[01:42.94]Not thinking you would have left me gladly
[01:48.35]I know you're not sorry
[01:52.78]Why should you be
[01:54.52]'Cause who am I to be in love
[01:58.60]When your love never is for me
[02:04.67]Me
[02:07.58]Da da da da da da
[02:11.43]Da da da da da da da
[02:16.44]Oh hmm
[02:19.54]So I think I better go
[02:25.18]I never really know how to please you
[02:30.45]You're looking at me like I'm see through
[02:36.69]I guess I'm gonna go
[02:40.74]I just never know how you feel
[02:46.06]Do you even feel anything
data.trans:
[ti:8]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.41]//
[00:00.83]//
[00:01.25]等等 让我把话说完
[00:06.96]我知道你不在乎
[00:10.78]但你能听我说完吗
[00:16.52]我承认 是我做得太过分了
[00:22.51]你让我心力交瘁
[00:26.07]你让我失去自由 现在我解脱了
[00:33.39]//
[00:37.22]//
[00:42.09]//
[00:45.43]我想我该放弃了
[00:50.98]我根本不知道怎么逗你开心
[00:56.33]你那样看着我 我还以为自己很了解你
[01:02.53]我想我要离开了
[01:06.59]但我不知道你是怎么想的
[01:11.91]你对我有感觉吗
[01:19.53]//
[01:23.34]//
[01:28.40]//
[01:32.87]你说 不要辜负我
[01:36.86]可你的语气那么悲伤
[01:39.60]我竭尽所能
[01:42.94]可我没想到离开我之后你那么开心
[01:48.35]我知道你不会后悔
[01:52.78]你怎么会后悔呢
[01:54.52]因为只有我这种傻子
[01:58.60]才会一厢情愿地爱上你
[02:04.67]我
[02:07.58]//
[02:11.43]//
[02:16.44]//
[02:19.54]我想我该放弃了
[02:25.18]我根本不知道怎么逗你开心
[02:30.45]你那样看着我 我还以为自己很了解你
[02:36.69]我想我要离开了
[02:40.74]但我不知道你是怎么想的
[02:46.06]你对我有感觉吗
